alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 21 at 2:10AM AKDT until March 21 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...High winds, snow and blowing snow with blizzard conditions at times. Additional snow accumulation around 1 inch. Winds gusting to 50 mph. Visibility less than one quarter mile at times. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKDT today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow will cause whiteout conditions. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will decrease slowly through the day.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
